bioimg.base.read_image¶

bioimg.base.read_image(fname, verbose=True)¶

Wrapper of bioformats.ImageReader.read() for a simple greyscale 2D-image in one of the OME-supported formats (https://docs.openmicroscopy.org/bio-formats/6.5.0/supported-formats.html)

Parameters
fnamestring

Image file name

verbosebool

If True print image shape

Returns
——-
imgarraynp.array
